AboutPage.greeting: I'm <age>{age}</age> years old. I've started my path as QA Tester in <startYear>{startYear}</startYear> and then I've changed to Software Engineering. Currently working as Fullstack developer focused on Front-end developing web and mobile solutions. I work on a project with thousands of daily accesses <link>Multi | Multiplan</link>.
AboutPage.social_invitation: Feel free to reach out to me on my social media!
AboutPage.experience: At Multiplan, I developed a parking lot application xthat now handles over <dau></dau> daily active users. This project spearheaded the company's innovation in parking systems countrywide, and the system currently manages over <lpr></lpr> registered license plates. More recently, I led the rollout of EV charging stations. For this initiative, I was responsible for integrating third-party partner systems with our API, handling both frontend and backend development.
